newsitem.title: USA: Omtool Ltd says files for IPO.
newsitem.headline: Omtool Ltd says files for IPO.

text.p: SALEM, N.H., July 15 ( Reuter) - Omtool Ltd said Tuesday it had filed a registration statement with the Securities and Exchange Commission for an initial public offering of four million shares of common stock with an expected price range of $8.00 to $10.00 per share.
The company said that of the total number of shares on offer, three million are being sold by the company and one million by selling stockholders.
Robertson, Stephens & Co, Montgomery Securities and First Albany Corp are the underwriters on the deal and have an overallotment option of up to 600,000 shares, the company said.
Omtool makes open, client/server facsimile software designed to automate and integrate fax communications.
